fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: learn a new language; write better ads)
Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: learn how to make money; make more sales)

fields.fieldTitle: Another really Big Payoff they want

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: score high on a test; snap up hordes of hungry subscribers)
Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: plug any book into your brain and instantly download that knowledge; read your prospects' minds and know exactly what they will spend money on)

fields.fieldTitle: Far-fetched solution to get that daydream outcome

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB ending in "ING". (Ex: inserting a socket into our brains to download the information; doing a "Vulcan Mind Meld" with your target audience members)

fields.fieldTitle: The slow or "manual" way most people use to approach the problem

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: find a good one to two hours if we want to open a book and sit down to read; spend many hours researching potential markets on Facebook)

fields.fieldTitle: Main action they have to take
The main result they want to do or have in this situation

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: get the information we need out of the book; do the research we need on any particular niche market)

fields.fieldTitle: The usual thing people do to try to shortcut the process

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ "use": (Ex: use the Internet; use fancy software)

fields.fieldTitle: The drawback to that usual shortcut making it a bad option

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "The problem with this usual shortcut is that there are / is _____________."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: millions of pages of listings for any topic you want to study; tons of confusing and overwhelming results you can't understand or use

fields.fieldTitle: A cool discovery you made that changed everything

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "Then something amazing happened. I _____________"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: met this guy named Howard Berg at a seminar. He spent just a few short hours with me and it paid off big time; stumbled across 5 specific ad templates that crushed anything else I'd ever tried before

fields.fieldTitle: Big results others want, can expect to get from your discovery

fieldHint.hint1: Starts w/ a VERB. (Ex: double your reading speed; increase clickthroughs by 50% or more)

fields.fieldTitle: How fast can they get results?
How much is what you're selling?
